story_teamflare_02_05000/2401_1001_0100_: We might be in a bad situation...
story_teamflare_02_05000/2401_1001_0500_:
I have no intention of starting anything with
you all.
story_teamflare_02_05000/2401_1001_0600_:
I was just using this sygna suit made using Team
Flare’s technology...
story_teamflare_02_05000/2401_1001_0700_:
to train with Yveltal and the others and
strengthen the power of our sync stone.
story_teamflare_02_05000/2401_1001_0800_: So Team Flare going wild in town was...
story_teamflare_02_05000/2401_1001_0900_:
I can at least say that I wasn’t the one who gave
them orders.
story_teamflare_02_05000/2401_1001_1100_:
It seems like we have some troublemakers in
Team Flare. I’m already taking steps to deal
with them, though.
story_teamflare_02_05000/2401_1001_1200_:
I don’t plan to cause a commotion on Pasio
right now.
story_teamflare_02_05000/2401_1001_1400_: I knew you’d keep our promise.
story_teamflare_02_05000/2401_1001_1500_: Is that your new partner Pokémon, Lysandre?
story_teamflare_02_05000/2401_1001_1600_: Indeed. This Pokémon is called Volcanion.
story_teamflare_02_05000/2401_1001_1700_:
It possesses the power to blow a mountain away
with a steam explosion and level the ground so
people can live there.
story_teamflare_02_05000/2401_1001_1800_:
I hear that in some regions it is worshiped as a
nation-building Pokémon.
story_teamflare_02_05000/2401_1001_2000_:
Volcanion’s power can be used for more than
just moving mountains.
story_teamflare_02_05000/2401_1001_2100_: It could blow up towns and transform the world.
story_teamflare_02_05000/2401_1001_2200_: Is that why you have Volcanion?!
story_teamflare_02_05000/2401_1001_2400_: I found beauty in Volcanion’s existence.
